definitions.definition: Aggressive behaviour; loud, intimidating behaviour that convincingly threatens violence without necessarily actually becoming violent.
examples: Move along, lads; we don't want any aggro .

definitions.definition: A measure of how belligerent a player is – a high value may inspire either avoidance or preemptive hostile action from enemies.
Hostile attention from an enemy that should target players with better defenses.
examples: You just pulled aggro off the tank and wiped the raid .

secondary_definitions: ( chiefly UK , Australia ) Aggressive behaviour; loud, intimidating behaviour that convincingly threatens violence without necessarily actually becoming violent.
( gaming ) A measure of how belligerent a player is – a high value may inspire either avoidance or preemptive hostile action from enemies.
( gaming ) Hostile attention from an enemy that should target players with better defenses.
